body.name: Rubber Broom Pet Hair Remover, Carpet Squeegee with Telescoping 60.2 Inches Long Handle for Cleaning Fur Rug, Hardwood Floor, Tile, Window
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 17 mins
features: PET HAIR RAKE: Rubber bristles is great for gathering hair and debris together. Silicon broom acts like magnet, no dust will fly when cleaning. It avoids risk of scratching, more protective and more effective.

VERSATILE SQUEEGEE: The pet hair sweeper releases you from various cleaning tools. It’s enough to clean dust and water on the floor using this wiper broom. It suits for matted carpet, hardwood floors, window, etc.

TELESCOPIC HANDLE: The upgraded buckle design allows you to extend the handle based on your needs inch by inch. From 52.3” to 60.2”, the rubber broom handle is more stable than old thread extension rod.
NON-SLIP GRIP: The grip is made of premium EVA foam material, has the advantages of good cushioning. It’s better thermal-insulated and won’t get slippery even it’s moisture.
EASY TO CLEAN-UP AND STORE: The pet hair broom is easy to clean only by rinsing with water. Dust and hair come off easily, and hang it on your wall. It lasts longer and saves place.

productInformation.value: #56,801 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #38 in Household Push Brooms

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gbye Human Hair!
reviews.reviewText: Wow! I really needed something to help my daughter collect all the hair she sheds in her room, and this did the work beautifully! The top portion of the pole is extendable if you need that extra reach without breaking your back. You can break the pole into 4-5 parts for storage if you'd like too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for sweeping on hardwood floors
reviews.reviewText: I love this! I had a similar sweeper/broom from a different brand but opted for this one this time. It has a telescoping handle which the other one didn't have, but the handle feels wobbly at times. It almost feels like it needs to be tightened, but it is all the way screwed in. That's my only complaint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable Broom with Good Grip
reviews.reviewText: I was impressed with the stability of this broom as I put it together. Too many other ones tend to flex a lot or feel flimsy when fully extended. This one though had strong connections and maintains it stability the entire time I use it. Another nice feature of this broom was the hand grip which fit perfectly for me and helped make sweeping up pet hair a breeze. I am keeping this broom up off the ground as one of our previous ones from a different manufacturer had the bristles stay bent and out of shape after resting on the ground for too long. I'm aiming to prevent the possibility of that with this broom as I really like its ergonomics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works half way
reviews.reviewText: Gets a lot of the job done but your still better off vacuuming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is amazing
reviews.reviewText: This is great for getting pet hair off of the carpet, furniture, or inside the car. The squeegee part is great for wet floors and the rubber scrubber works really good too. The amount of hair that this pulled out of my carpet was insane. I use it weekly now and use it in my truck whenever the dogs go for a ride. The handle extends for hard to reach places like under the couches. Love this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It does what it claims for the most part.
reviews.reviewText: This will get quite a bit of hair off your low pile rugs, but it won't get it all. I'd recommend vacuuming first, then going over with this broom. For the price, I am not complaining, and I have used it multiple times, but I do think the same result could be received with a good vacuum, which I do have. Can also be used on furniture where maybe your vacuum can't reach. Overall, a very handy tool if you have pets that shed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pulled massive amounts of cat hair out of our rugs
reviews.reviewText: Our place is largely tile and wood. As such we rely a lot on area rugs.While we clean them regularly, many of them aren't easy to vacuum due to their size and the suction on the vacuum trying to pick them up.have tried the rake kind of floor brushes before and while they do work in thew few rooms we have with carpet (which we can vacuum) they don't do as well on the rugs that don't have as much pile to them and which also get dragged along.Using this like a rake, pulling it to me, I pulled up an alarmingly huge bunch of cat hair from a rug our cat regularly sits and rolls around on. This is in a fairly high traffic area and I honestly couldn't believe how much came up from a 3x4 rug with just a few times going through the motions.As others have mentioned, it seems to have a little less functionality (at least dry) when working directly on the hard floors but the ability to attach a towel to the top does give it some nice possibilities as a mop but with scrubbing action on the bristles and then finishing/drying with a dish towel.It comes in several pieces in a pretty nondescript box and produces something that feels sturdy and has a padded spot for where your second hand would hold to push against a surface for leverage which was a nice touch.It's telescoping to a degree. This doesn't add a ton of length but for using it on the floor, at over 6', I found it to be plenty adequate.Overall, I'm very happy with this and compared to what else is out there, at $16, it really feels like a steal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two Paws Up! Works Fur Sure!
reviews.reviewText: Wow! Works great. Have found a quick & satisfying pass over my carpets before vacuuming makes it easier & more effective fur removal. Love that I can easily adjust length as well as convert it to a mop for floors or windows etc and take it apart to store in cupboard. Squeegee side a plus.
